maqras.text: main us shahar ki qasam khaata hoon
aur aap us shahar mein muqeem hai
aur (qasam hai) insaani baap aur aulaad ki
yaqinan hum ne insaan ko (badi) mashaqqath mein paida kiya hai
kya ye gumaan karta hai, ke ye kisi ke bas mein hee nahi
kehta (phirta) hai ke main ne to bahuth kuch maal qarch kar daala
kya (yo) samajhta hai ke, kisi ne ose dekha (hee) nahi
kya hum ne us ki do aankhe nahi banaayi
aur zabaan aur hoont (nahi banaaye)
hum ne dikha diye, us ko duno raaste
so us se na ho saka ke ghaati mein daakhil hota
aur kya samjha ke ghaati hai kya
kisi gardan (ghulaam, laundi) azaad karna
ya bhook waale din khaana khilaana
kisi rishtedaar yateem ko
ya qaak saar miskeen ko
phir un logo mein se ho jaata jo imaan laate aur ek dosre ko sabr ki aur rahem karne ki wasiyath karte hai
yahi log hai daaye baazo waale (khush baqti waale)
aur jin logo ne hamaari aayato ke saath kufr kiya, ye kam-baqti waale hai
in hee par aag hogi jo chaaro taraf se ghiri hoyi hogi
qasam hai suraj ki aur us ki dhoop ki
qasam hai chaandh ki jab us ke piche aaye
qasam hai din ki jab suraj ko numaaya kare
qasam hai raath ki jab ose dhaanp le
qasam hai asmaan ki aur us ke banaane ki
qasam hai zameen ki aur ose hamwaar karne ki
qasam hai nafs ki aur ose durusth banaane ki
phir samajh di us ko badh kaari ki aur bach kar chalne ki
jis ne ose paak kiya wo kamyaab hoa
aur jis ne ose qaaq mein mila diya wo na kaam hoa
(khaum) samoodh ne apni sarkashi ke baayes jhutlaaya
jab un mein ka bada badh baqth uth khada hoa
unhe Allah ke rasool ne farma diya tha ke Allah ta’ala ki oontni aur us ke pine ki baari ki (hifaazath karo)

un logo ne apne paighambar ko jhota samajh kar us oontni ki koonche kaat di, pas un ke rab ne un ke gunaaho ke baayes, un par halaakath daali aur phir halaakath ko aam kar diya aur us basti ko baraabar kar diya
wo nahi darta, us ke tabaah kun anjaam se
qasam hai raath ki jab chaa jaaye
aur qasam hai din ki jab roushan ho
aur qasam hai us zaath ki jis ne nar wa maada ko paida kiya
yaqinan tumhaari koshish muqtalif qism ki hai
jis ne diya (Allah ki raah mein) aur dara (apne rab se)
aur nek baath ki tasdeeq karta rahega
to hum bhi us ko asaan raaste ki sahulath denge
lekin jis ne baqili ki aur be parvaahi barti
aur nek baath ki takzeeb ki
to hum bhi us ki tangi aur mushkil ke samaan mayassar kar denge
us ka maal ose (aundha) girne ke waqth kuch kaam na ayega
beshak raah dikha dena, hamaare zimme hai
aur hamaare hee haath aaqirath aur dunya hai
main ne tumhe shole maarti hoyi aag se dara diya hai
jis mein sirf wahi badh baqth daakhil hoga
jis ne jhutlaaya aur (us ki pairvi se) mu pher liya
aur us se aisa shaqs door rakha jayega, jo bada parhezgaar hoga
jo paaki haasil karne ke liye apna maal deta hai
kisi ka us par koyi ehsaan nahi, ke jis ka badhla diya ja raha ho
balke sirf apne parvardigaar buzrug wa bulandh ki raza chaahne ke liye
yaqinan wo (Allah) bhi, an-qareeb raza mandh ho jayega
qasam hai chaasht ke waqt ki
aur qasam hai raath ki jab chaa jaaye
na to tere rab ne tujhe chohda hai aur na wo bezaar ho gaya hai
yaqinan tere liye anjaam, aghaaz se behtar hoga
tujhe tera rab bahuth jald (in’aam) dega aur tu raazi (wa khush) ho jayega
kya us ne tujhe yateem pa kar jageh nahi di
aur tujhe raah bhula pa kar hidaayath nahi di
aur tujhe na-daar pa kar tawangar nahi bana diya
pas yateem par tu bhi saqti na kiya kar
aur na sawaal karne waale ko daant dapat
aur apne rab ki nemato ko bayaan karta reh
